keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stop Brexit and secure our place in Europe
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prevent Brexit to remain in the European Union and secure a stable future for Scotland in Europe.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect Scotland’s right to decide its own future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure Scotland's decision-making power and right to self-determination.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Action on climate change and the environment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Address climate change urgently and protect the environment through robust action.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect our NHS from Trump's trade deals
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Shield NHS from American trade agreements that could undermine its services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Against Tory austerity and for public service investment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose Conservative austerity measures and promote investment in public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: People in Glasgow North voted by 78% to remain in the European Union.

issues.brexitEurope: End the uncertainty and chaos of Brexit. People in Glasgow North voted by 78% to remain in the European Union – but we face being dragged out of the EU against our will by a Tory Government who want to use Brexit to undermine workers’ rights, damage the environment and strike trade deals with the United States that could threaten our NHS.
issues.environment: Action on climate change and the environment. Tackling the global climate emergency. I’ll always be a strong voice on climate change.
issues.health: Protect our NHS from Trump's trade deals.
issues.socialWelfare: I've seen first hand the impact of this toxic Tory Government at Westminster and have helped hundreds of constituents left in hardship by the Universal Credit scandal.
